segments.text: Hello , George ! Haven't seen you for some time.Where have you been ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been away in Paris for the last two month.Glad to see you again.How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very well.Thank you.Did you have a good time there ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I had a wonderful time .
segments.speaker: S2
